column1: Service Domain specification for Prospect Campaign Design

column2: This Service Domain designs and refines prospect campaigns (or integrates designs from external campaign specialists). Prospect campaigns target new customer acquisition and are typically proactive (involving prospect targeting, contact and solicitation). Version numbering is used to track the impact of changes made to campaigns over their usage.
A prospect acquisition campaign is updated to provide amended/improved pricing terms that can be offered to targeted prospects poor take-up rate has been detected for the campaign
Design and refine prospect campaign specifications based on their impact
Define the target profile/impact of a campaign. Specify a prospect campaign. Track the impact of a campaign. Refine/reconfigure a campaign
